text:
[Verse]
Stars above they shine so bright
Midnight magic feels so right
Dancing shadows in the night
Hold on tight to morning light

[Chorus]
Midnight magic in the air
Feel the rhythm everywhere
Hearts are glowing fire's flare
Midnight magic we all share

[Verse 2]
Moonlight sparkles in our eyes
Whispers float in velvet skies
Time stands still no goodbyes
In this moment no disguise

[Chorus]
Midnight magic in the air
Feel the rhythm everywhere
Hearts are glowing fire's flare
Midnight magic we all share

[Bridge]
Close your eyes and take my hand
Feel the magic as we stand
In a world so wild and grand
Midnight speaks we understand

[Chorus]
Midnight magic in the air
Feel the rhythm everywhere
Hearts are glowing fire's flare
Midnight magic we all share
title: Midnight Magic
